content.prompt: In the United States, 75 percent of adults wear glasses or contact lenses. A random sample of 10 adults in the United States will be selected. Which of the following is closest to the probability that fewer than 8 of the selected adults wear glasses or contact lenses?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
